Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.10c7d635-4003-49b2-b470-c232afee0f4d.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.123db49e-1a34-49b1-a3e7-07c24c4e98b1.prompt=Enter a value for proxyUsername b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.19fd5418-37a9-455c-a02a-bf51817208e7.prompt=Process Instance ID b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.1a4dc192-f4a6-46b8-99f5-1752159aa21b.description=This workflow returns the component properties and values using Artifact APIs. result\: propertyNameValuesList\: pipe separated list of property name and values ( where each property name and values would be ; seprated and multiple values would be , seprated) e.g. - property 1; value1,value2|property 2; value3|property 3; value3,value4|........ b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.1e2c79bb-1b61-4289-9196-d62b7bd9db83.prompt=Enter a value for keystore b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.20ca4f18-72a6-4620-82bd-c42b4e406fa6.prompt=Enter a value for socketTimeout b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.232ee5c8-3f30-4691-8d6a-b0ea7807ddf1.prompt=Enter a value for trustPassword b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.246501ff-bbd0-4ba2-92c4-9faa9236e8ec.prompt=User Identifier b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.2a0320fe-b323-486d-9022-ed81181dba54.prompt=User Identifier b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.3223c2c9-fb15-4cfe-9ccf-aec38b1796bc.description=
Compares two strings, returning a true response if and only if they contain the same sequence of characters. A null string is considered to be equal to an empty string.

Inputs\:
string1 - The first string.
string2 - The second string.
ignoreCase - If set to 'true', then the comparison ignores case considerations. The two strings are considered equal ignoring case if they are of the same length and corresponding characters in the two strings are equal ignoring case. If set to any value other than 'true', then the strings must match exactly to be considered equal.

responses\:
true - If the two strings are equal
false - If the two strings are not equal
b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.3565d1d0-7179-418a-a18e-e4d43fddd65a.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.36999618-11da-460c-b1cf-b666eac82c44.description=
This workflow returns the details of the given artifact id.

Inputs-
artifactId –   Artifact  Id
userIdentifier  - User Identifier id
authType - The authentication type that this operation uses when trying to execute the request on the target server.
Valid values\: basic, form, digest, ntlm, kerberos, anonymous (no authentication).
Default value\: anonymous - authentication not used when executing the request.
kerberosConfFile - The path to the Kerberos configuration file. If this input is empty the kdc (Key Distribution Center) and realm will get their values from the full domain name which is obtained from the url of the web server.
timeout - The number of milliseconds to wait for a connection to be established. This input should be assigned a value greater than or equal to zero. A timeout value of zero is an infinite timeout.
Default value\: 0.
socketTimeout - The number of milliseconds to wait for the data to be retrieved. This input should be assigned a value greater than or equal to zero. A socketTimeout value of zero is an infinite timeout.
Default value\: 0.
useCookies - If true, enables cookie tracking. Cookies will be stored between consecutive calls. This is a boolean input. If a non-boolean value is specified, it will take the default value.
Default value\: true.
followRedirects - If true, the GET command automatically follows redirects. This is a boolean input. If a non-boolean value is specified, it will take the default value.
Default value\: true
proxy - A proxy to use when accessing the web site.
proxyPort - The port on the proxy to connect to.
proxyUsername - The username to use when connecting to the proxy.
proxyPassword - The password to use when connecting to the proxy.
encodeURL - If true, automatically encodes the URL. This is a boolean input. If a non-boolean value is specified, it will take the default value.
Default value\: false.
userAgent - The value that should be used if the HTTP header USER_AGENT has to be overridden.
trustAllRoots - If true, enables weak security over SSL. A SSL certificate is trusted even if no trusted CA issued it.
Default value\: true
keystore - URL of the keystore file or local path to it (e.g. %JAVA_HOME%/jre/lib/security/cacerts). It may be empty if HTTPS client authentication is not to be used.
keystorePassword - Password to unlock the keystore.
trustKeystore - URL of the truststore file or local path to it (e.g. %JAVA_HOME%/jre/lib/security/cacerts). It may be empty if HTTPS server authentication is not to be used.
trustPassword - Password to unlock the truststore.

Outputs-
name –  name of the artifactr 
displayName – display name of the artifact
artifactType – Artifact type
state – state of the artifact
lifeCycleState –  life cycle state of the artifact
lifeCycleSubState – life cycle sub state of the artifact
document  – returned XML document from API
b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.378829b5-7e17-41b1-bff8-67e84e638994.prompt=Enter a value for timeout b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.39302737-4bd5-4fbb-9924-2ffb958cfb14.prompt=Enter a value for followRedirects b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.3f33e9a7-9d24-40c8-8659-a34126cd5b57.prompt=Enter a value for encodeURL b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.401c2de0-87af-41cd-a3ad-ec938e110f87.prompt=Enter a value for kerberosConfFile b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.43f8a6eb-9159-47f3-8349-56067d565629.prompt=Enter a value for trustKeystore b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.53a893d6-85ef-4b33-8e0a-dd6012a331ba.prompt=Enter a value for value1 b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.5cd7a5d3-2354-44c6-a199-84e8e4ddc0ed.prompt=Process Instance ID b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.5feffd6b-1d93-4a64-8766-669fbe6aa9a6.prompt=Artifact ID b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.6c0ba605-9cd2-413c-bc2d-8e0ddca44db3.description=
This workflow returns the details of the given artifact id.

Inputs-
artifactId –   Artifact  Id
userIdentifier  - User Identifier id
authType - The authentication type that this operation uses when trying to execute the request on the target server.
Valid values\: basic, form, digest, ntlm, kerberos, anonymous (no authentication).
Default value\: anonymous - authentication not used when executing the request.
kerberosConfFile - The path to the Kerberos configuration file. If this input is empty the kdc (Key Distribution Center) and realm will get their values from the full domain name which is obtained from the url of the web server.
timeout - The number of milliseconds to wait for a connection to be established. This input should be assigned a value greater than or equal to zero. A timeout value of zero is an infinite timeout.
Default value\: 0.
socketTimeout - The number of milliseconds to wait for the data to be retrieved. This input should be assigned a value greater than or equal to zero. A socketTimeout value of zero is an infinite timeout.
Default value\: 0.
useCookies - If true, enables cookie tracking. Cookies will be stored between consecutive calls. This is a boolean input. If a non-boolean value is specified, it will take the default value.
Default value\: true.
followRedirects - If true, the GET command automatically follows redirects. This is a boolean input. If a non-boolean value is specified, it will take the default value.
Default value\: true
proxy - A proxy to use when accessing the web site.
proxyPort - The port on the proxy to connect to.
proxyUsername - The username to use when connecting to the proxy.
proxyPassword - The password to use when connecting to the proxy.
encodeURL - If true, automatically encodes the URL. This is a boolean input. If a non-boolean value is specified, it will take the default value.
Default value\: false.
userAgent - The value that should be used if the HTTP header USER_AGENT has to be overridden.
trustAllRoots - If true, enables weak security over SSL. A SSL certificate is trusted even if no trusted CA issued it.
Default value\: true
keystore - URL of the keystore file or local path to it (e.g. %JAVA_HOME%/jre/lib/security/cacerts). It may be empty if HTTPS client authentication is not to be used.
keystorePassword - Password to unlock the keystore.
trustKeystore - URL of the truststore file or local path to it (e.g. %JAVA_HOME%/jre/lib/security/cacerts). It may be empty if HTTPS server authentication is not to be used.
trustPassword - Password to unlock the truststore.

Outputs-
name –  name of the artifactr 
displayName – display name of the artifact
artifactType – Artifact type
state – state of the artifact
lifeCycleState –  life cycle state of the artifact
lifeCycleSubState – life cycle sub state of the artifact
document  – returned XML document from API
b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.70961034-9f1d-47a5-8bfc-5e29ab62e37f.prompt=Enter a value for encodeURL b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.761a2d77-738d-4328-a815-08942516b0cf.prompt=Enter a value for trustKeystore b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.792b2965-dbf2-4900-bec6-ece3c5f3c686.prompt=Resource Provider ID b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.7b716da6-5a82-4561-8ff3-d35122f06856.prompt=Enter a value for timeout b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.7ba649aa-cff8-477e-97be-042c7e92409e.prompt=User Identifier b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.80213b17-06d5-4365-b96f-268566102e65.prompt=Enter a value for proxyUsername b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.81545e7a-273e-441d-98f4-3807f51ef9a5.prompt=User Identifier b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.84754a17-5f23-43bb-ae90-15cd50eda902.prompt=Artifact ID b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.880e6f7a-6d40-421d-acac-3ff615a08e38.prompt=Enter a value for userAgent b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.8963c174-2292-48b6-ae32-ee6a3dc69aba.description=
Checks if a number or word is greater than another number or word. Word comparison is case-sensitive in alphabetical order.

Inputs\:
value1 - The first value.
value2 - The second value.

Returns\:
value1 > value2

Responses\:
success - The boolean operation was evaluated to true.
failure - Something went wrong or the boolean operation returned false.
b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.8db97ce4-6c68-44ec-a115-130cd651efe4.description=
Checks if a number or word is greater than or equal to another number or word. Word comparison is case-sensitive in alphabetical order.

Inputs\:
value1 - The first value.
value2 - The second value.

Returns\:
value1 >\= value2

Responses\:
success - The boolean operation was evaluated to true.
failure - Something went wrong or the boolean operation returned false.
b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.98032111-8c65-49b3-a532-4db9299975c3.prompt=Enter a value for keystorePassword b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.9a48b117-26e8-4c30-884c-918f1527e69f.prompt=Enter a value for authType b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.9aa3b410-bae3-4f0c-a335-69a3d893f34b.prompt=Enter a value for proxyPort b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.9c164761-8b61-4cf7-8974-a1697f523210.prompt=Enter a value for trustAllRoots b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.9e37f7db-2e6b-4f1a-b64e-31d36b6ee7e3.prompt=Enter a value for useCookies b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.9e4c205e-3846-4a33-88a2-8accf0cdd84c.description=This workflow adds/ updates the component properties to Instance using Artifact APIs. onlyUpdate\: yes/no yes - To update values of existing properties no - To add and/or update properties keyValuePairs\: If you want to Add/update new properties\: property1 PUBLIC INTEGER 5 property2 PUBLIC STRING abc xyz If you want to only update the values of existing properties\: property1 5 property2 abc xyz b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.a236f135-46fd-4581-9e57-1abbe9d5f963.prompt=User Identifier b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.a534d93c-8887-464f-9b5e-34c7af7b068c.prompt=Enter a value for trustPassword b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.a823b4a7-d94f-43fb-a48f-05f2aecd0b98.prompt=Enter a value for socketTimeout b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.a84f0237-24fa-4ad0-b8a1-b68eba5918d6.prompt=Enter a value for proxyPassword b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.a96a8d53-7fcf-41da-bcbf-d9d140daf80a.prompt=User Identifier b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.b044f50b-8ed1-4ead-b671-3b7343a07851.prompt=Enter a value for authType b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.b0a056c6-ca97-4836-9689-060ad447d91b.prompt=User Identifier b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.b2c08427-3504-4db4-8c3a-fd1139d9ca11.prompt=Enter a value for kerberosConfFile b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.b5e15d34-ba3c-484e-9b7c-24c8fae999e4.prompt=Enter a value for followRedirects b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.c3fa0350-de70-4bcb-a072-74d5edaf57cb.prompt=Enter a value for keystore b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.c7a10854-104f-4dbd-afcc-74c0232dd8fc.prompt=Process Instance ID b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.d485e3e2-99cc-4e4e-add1-60adcc82f1bf.prompt=Enter a value for keystorePassword b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.d48bdab3-3fef-4873-bf00-3ac9ec088148.prompt=Enter a value for proxyPort b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.d71ea239-74d6-4945-bfdc-e9e419ad76c1.prompt=Enter a value for proxy b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.d90d948e-7225-4aab-be46-f85ec8d56c8d.description=
Adds a flow variable into the local context (available to itself and child flows only)

Input Parameters\:
keyName - the name of the flow variable to use
myValue - the value to assign the flow variable

Responses\:
success - assigned the flow variable

Scriptlet Example\:
[$scriptletContext putGlobal\: $keyName, $myValue];
b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.da0e570a-ca01-47ad-baaf-f8f896eb321e.prompt=Enter a value for proxyPassword b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.dc21c15d-be56-492e-9118-a841b4e24e10.prompt=Enter a value for trustAllRoots b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.dcfad0f7-637f-41b6-8ab7-c129b8c5a753.prompt=User Identifier b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.description=
This flow will flex up or flex down the memory configuration of all the servers in a server group. The user is expected to enter the memory in MB that the servers should have. The flow will then apply this input as the final state of the memory for all the servers in the server group. If the memory of the server is less than the user input, then the server memory will be flexed up to the input. If the memory is lesser, then the server memory will be flexed down to the input. No changes will be made if the input and the current configuration are the same.

The flex up and flex down operations will execute whether the server is running, suspended or in switched off state.
If the flex up or flex down operation fails for one server, the action will continue on the remaining servers in the server group.
The maximum number that can be given as input for a flex up operation depends on the underlying configured vCenter.

Inputs\:
MEMORY_IN_MB	\: The memory in megabytes that the server should be set to.
CSA_CONTEXT_ID 	\: CSA Context Id
CSA_PROCESS_ID 	\: CSA Process Instance Id
SVC_COMPONENT_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Service component Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\:SVC_COMPONENT_ID]
RSC_PROVIDER_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Resource Provider Id that was selected at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\:RSC_PROVIDER_ID]
SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_EMAIL \: This token will resolve to the subscriber’s email address. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_EMAIL]
RSC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Resource Subscription Id that was created from the Resource Offering at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID]
SVC_COMPONENT_TYPE 	\: This token will resolve to the Service component type. Eg\: Server.. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_COMPONENT_TYPE]
RSC_POOL_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Resource pool Id that was selected at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_POOL_ID]
SVC_INSTANCE_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Service Instance Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_INSTANCE_ID]
SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Subscription Id that was created at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID]
PRN_COMPONENT_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the parent Component’s Service Component Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: PRN_COMPONENT_ID]
REQ_ORG_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Organization Id associated with the service request. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: REQ_ORG_ID]
REQ_USER_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the User Id associated with the service request. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: REQ_USER_ID]
USR_ORG_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Organization Id associated with the subscriber. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: USR_ORG_ID]
RSC_BINDING_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Resource Binding Id that was created at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_BINDING_ID]

These tokens with the default values are resolved by CSA when the flow is invoked.

Responses\:
success		\: The flex up/flex down operation succeeded on all servers of the server group
failure		\: The flex up/flex down operation may have failed on one or more servers of the server group
b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.e5c5ee16-4ba9-4316-9e60-9fda3ac69d9b.prompt=Enter a value for userAgent b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.eb7d1f2e-ad74-47cc-a1a2-0982e761f58b.prompt=Process Instance ID b0cacf9f-87d3-4a25-9108-5042fc4386fe.f0d90799-77f3-498a-a978-bd665c254b84.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State
flow.name: vCenter Simple Compute - Server Group Flex Memory

staticBinding.value: Flex CPU action succeeded for all servers in server group
Flex Memory action failed for one or more servers in server group

scriptlet.name: Step Requested memory divisible by 4? in Flow vCenter Simple Compute - Server Group Flex Memory (8963c174-2292-48b6-ae32-ee6a3dc69aba)

staticBinding.value: Flex Memory action succeeded for all servers in server group
Status has changed on your subscription - ${subscriptionName}
Invalid input. Memory size should be greader than 512 and in multiples of 4
Flex CPU action failed for one or more servers in server group
Updating the memory configuration on all the servers in the server group
